scripts.dev-build-local: npm run build&& SET NODE_ENV=development&& pm2 start ./build/server.js --name ams-server-dev-build
scripts.dev-build: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development pm2 start ./build/server.js --name ams-server-dev-build
scripts.staging: npm run build && NODE_ENV=staging pm2 start ./build/server.js --name ams-server-dev-staging
scripts.prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start ./build/server.js --name ams-server-dev-production
